pages.text: $(l)$(6)Function:$() Giving it silkworms and some leaves, the $(5)Automatic Silker$() produces string. $(br2) $(l)$(6)Same as:$() Right clicking with a $(5)silkworm$() on leaves then using a $(5)crook $()to get the string.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: $(li)$(l)$(6)Extra info:$() This block uses the (Blue | Top Face) to input both Silkworms and Leaves.
